## isSelfDescribingJson() function

Check if a variable is a valid, non-empty Self Describing JSON

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isSelfDescribingJson(input: unknown): input is SelfDescribingJson;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | unknown | The variable to validate |

<b>Returns:</b>

input is SelfDescribingJson

True if a valid Self Describing JSON
